Description: Deploys managed nodegroup for EKS, and installs Graylog API Security Helm chart. Installation details are stored in an S3-hosted static website.

EKSClusterName.Description: Enter the name of your existing EKS cluster. Required.

EKSClusterSubnets.Description: Select all subnets attached to your existing EKS cluster. Required.

EKSNodeCount.Description: Enter the number of nodes for your EKS node group. Default is 3.

EKSNodeCpuArch.Description: Select the desired CPU architecture for the EKS nodes. Default is arm64.
EKSNodeCpuArch.ConstraintDescription: Supported architectures: "x86", "arm64". Please enter a valid architecture type.

ClusterName.Description: Name of your EKS cluster. Connect to it to run helm commands from your terminal using the aws cli: aws eks update-kubeconfig --name <ClusterName>

SuccessURL.Description: Graylog API Security post-installation notes. Includes the web UI access URL, DB capture URL, and kubeconfig file.
